<< groot Graphics functions image >>

hold

Retain current plot when adding new plots.

Syntax

hold('on')
hold('off')
hold('all')
hold()
hold(ax, ...)

Input argument

'on'

turn hold on.

'off'

turn hold off.

'all'

same as hold on.

ax

Target axes: axes.

Output argument

ax

a graphics object: axes type.

Description

hold allows to construct a plot sequence incrementally.

Example

f = figure();
x = linspace(-pi, pi);
y1 = cos(x);
plot(x, y1)
hold on
y2 = sin(x);
plot(x, y2)
hold off

See also

ishold, newplot.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
